oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Proclamations; Governors
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); Turney, Peter, 1827-1903
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Proclamation of Tennessee Governor Peter Turney, dated May 28, 1896, designating the observance of June 1st and 2nd as official state holidays commemorating the anniversary of Tennessee's admission into the Union.
Peter Turney served as Governor of Tennessee from 1893 to 1897.
